title.rendered: Saratoga Springs High School Senior Photos  (Last Call)

content.rendered:
Dear Parents & Students,
As the official Yearbook Photographers for Saratoga High School we are
pleased to announce that Last Call Senior Photos are scheduled for:
Friday, September 9th, 2022
9:00am- 2:00pm
Photos will be taken in the HS AUDITORIUM
We will be offering a “BASIC” sitting (4) proofs-1 outfit Free of Charge!
Sittings at the High School can be conveniently scheduled by going online to: https://www.signupgenius.com/go/10c0e48aea928a5facf8-saratoga1 and selecting the available time and date that works best for your schedule.
Adirondack School Portraits
